it.unitn.ing.rista.util.function
Class ParameterFunction

java.lang.Object
  it.unitn.ing.rista.util.function.ParameterFunction
Direct Known Subclasses:
CagliotiFunction, PolynomialFunction
public class ParameterFunction
extends java.lang.Object

The ParameterFunction is an class that implements a generic function of a parameters list; to be subclassed.

Since:
JDK1.1
